name: Retronica Automatic
description:
Winning game made for November 2021 University Game Jam. Theme was 'Retro' Everything but audio & some assets created by me in the 24 hour period.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Throw Gun

P / Esc - Pause

Objective:

Survive for as long as you can and kill enemies to rack up points.

Get as high a score as you can!
